name: war
description: Create a warâ€”a series of skirmishes with a set amount of time between!

options.name: time
options.description: Set how long (in minutes) each skirmish should run for.

options.name: start
options.description: Set how many minutes out the war should begin. Max 30 minutes.

options.name: quantity
options.description: Set how many skirmishes should be included in this war.

options.name: interval
options.description: Set how much time should be between each skirmish..
